title: Review Multiple Clients' Vitals Daily
task: Review the ALFRED dashboard on her tablet each day
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to see shared health data with user consent, so that privacy is protected.

title: Manual Control of Multi-Client Vital Logs
task: Scan vital signs of multiple older adults at once
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to control logging of essential vital signs with consent, so that patient privacy is protected.

title: Filter Alerts by Priority
task: Filter alerts by priority to focus on urgent cases
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to filter alerts by priority when permitted, so I can focus on urgent cases and manage clients effectively.

title: Respect Client Privacy Settings
task: Respect each client's privacy settings when viewing data
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to see only the health data clients allow me to see, so I respect their privacy and keep their trust.

title: Arrange Video Calls for Guided Exercise
task: Arrange video calls with clients for guided exercise games
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to start video calls for guided exercises with my clients only with their consent, so I can support their activity respectfully.

title: Respect Privacy Over Clinical Overrides
task: Express concern about overriding privacy for clinical needs
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to limit automatic sharing of private data to emergencies and essential updates, so privacy is protected.

title: Respect User Autonomy Despite Risks
task: Respects user autonomy even when worried about risks
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to let users make their own choices even if I worry about risks, so they feel independent and in control.

title: Explain ALFRED Features During Calls
task: Explains ALFRED’s features and customization options during calls
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to explain its features simply during calls so I can help patients without confusing them.

title: Respect Client's Preference for Minimal Explanations
task: Feels concerned when clients dismiss advice or prefer minimal explanations
summary: As a caregiver, I want ALFRED to respect users' wishes for less guidance and easier options, so they feel independent and comfortable.

title: Explain Data Sharing Clearly at Visits
task: Visits clients' homes to engage directly with them about their health and technology use
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to explain data sharing clearly and respect clients' choices, so they feel safe and control their data sharing.

title: Encourage Client Activity Enthusiasm
task: Encourages clients to maintain enthusiasm for physical and cognitive activities
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to support clients with enjoyable activities, including communication options that respect user control, so they stay happy and involved.

title: Manage Flexible and Strict Care Coordination
task: Feels the challenge of coordinating between flexible informal care and strict clinical care
summary: As a caregiver, I want to select sensor data to share with permission, so that user privacy is respected and care stays personal.

title: Prepare Personalized Visit Plans
task: Prepares for home visits with personalized plans based on Olivia’s ALFRED use
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to prepare exercise plans respecting privacy and user consent, so users feel safe and motivated.

title: Balance Privacy and Social Engagement
task: Feels concern that ALFRED’s customization might increase Olivia’s isolation
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to support social interaction only when clients allow it, so their privacy and comfort are always respected.

title: Monitor Privacy Settings with Respect
task: Monitors Olivia’s privacy settings while supporting her social inclusion
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to check clients' privacy settings and share data only with their clear permission to respect their choices.
